sense.gloss: to muster (e.g. one's courage), to call forth, to rouse up
to be enlivened, to be invigorated

sdata.j: ヨットは↑猛威↑↓もうい↓を↑振↑↓|ふ↓るう|↑嵐↑↓あらし↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑翻弄↑↓ほんろう↓された。
sdata.e: The yacht was at the mercy of the dreadful storm.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑子供↑↓こども↓に↑平気↑↓へいき↓で↑暴力↑↓ぼうりょく↓を↑振↑↓|ふ↓るう|。
sdata.e: She has no qualms about being violent towards her children.
